name: Nuke Finder
description:
Nuke Finder is a 2.5D platformer made with Unity where you are one of the last people on a decaying planet that's being threatened by a nuclear malfunction inside a nuclear bunker. 

Grab your nuclear suit and collect the missing pieces to avoid the planet's destruction before it's too late.

Controls:

ActionKey(s)                   MoveA & DRunLeft ShiftJumpSpaceRollECall platformQUse ladderCClimb ladderW & SPause gameEscape

I'd really appreciate if you can rate the game and leave some feedback on the comments :D, thank you!

Note: For a better experience playing Nuke Finder you can download the zip file and run the executable for Windows :D.
